publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7937 Sandra White: Women in Employment—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Women’s Convention for organising the conference, Women in Employment: What’s It Worth?, in Glasgow on 5 February 2011; notes that the conference looked at and discussed barriers to women in employment and how to overcome these; welcomes the feedback from the workshops held at the conference, which highlighted the difficulties that women face in this area, and looks forward to equality in the workplace and beyond. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Kenneth Gibson*
